select table_name tableName, engine, table_comment tableComment, create_time createTime from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database())
and table_name like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')
order by create_time desc
select table_name tableName, engine, table_comment tableComment, create_time createTime from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = #{tableName}

select column_name columnName, data_type dataType, column_comment columnComment, column_key columnKey, extra,( CASE WHEN data_type = 'float' OR data_type = 'double' OR data_type = 'SMALLINT' OR data_type = 'MEDIUMINT' OR data_type = 'INT' OR data_type = 'INTEGER' OR data_type = 'decimal'
THEN
NUMERIC_PRECISION
WHEN data_type = 'bigint'
THEN '20'
WHEN data_type = 'tinyint'
THEN '1'
WHEN data_type = 'dataetime'
THEN '0'
ELSE CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH END ) as length from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} and table_schema = (select database()) order by ordinal_position
